name: Six pieces from 'in the zone' #4
description:
No more than six minutes collectively after a hastily mixed monotone palette of acrylic paint before a life drawing class in Alpine Queenstown, Aotearoa/New Zealand. Our regular long boarding model from Argentina named Marco. High on a peak of observation drawing fluency, now calling to mind looming peaks ahead that may be gently crested with increased logistics and resolve. An overlooked, carelessly named, deeply nested folder on the hard-drive that wasn't dropped. 

A long-gone stack of physical drawings presented in a process many magnitudes longer than their creation time. Rescued, documented, minted, preserved: Six pieces from 'in the zone'.

2048 x 2048 px | measureless.io
